original_title: Mork & Mindy: A Dream Zone Parody
overview: "Na-Nu, Na-Nu! " greets the always horny alien, Mork (Evan Stone) in Mork & Mindy: A Dream Zone Parody. Mork embarks on a XXX journey as he observes Earth's culture. While his superiors on the planet Ork want to hear about politics and economics, Mork prefers to learn about more exciting customs, like orgies, 69s, blowjobs and vibrators. Mork meets the perfect subject, Mindy (Chanel Preston), a hot, young girl with a mesmerizing rack. Though Mork can be frustrating, Mindy decides to help teach the wacky extraterrestrial about her world's greatest treasure - the female body. Dream Zone creates a XXX parody of one of Earth's most beloved TV classics, which is "kay-o" in Mork's book.
title: Mork & Mindy: A Dream Zone Parody
